Hier_können_Sie_Ihren_Titel_eingeben,_da: Here you can enter your title, this is required
Der_Benutzer_kann_eine_optionale_Beschre: The user can write an optional description
Verwenden_Sie_diese_Schaltfläche,_um_Ihr: Use this button to save your tasks.
Sie_können_Ihre_Aufträge_nach_ihrem_Stat: You can filter your tasks by their status: open, in progress, completed.
Alle_Aufgaben: All tasks based on your filter are displayed here. You can scroll infinitely to load more tasks if available.
Indem_Sie_Ihren_Aufgabentitel_eingeben,_: By entering your task title, you can find it.
Wenn_eine_Aufgabe_als_aktiv_gilt,_wird_d: If a task is considered active, its status will be shown as In Progress or Open. In the open status, a 'Completed' checkmark appears on the right.
Sie_können_die_Aufgabe_bearbeiten,_indem: You can edit the task by clicking here.
Here you can delete a task.
no_response: [API ERROR] No response received from the server.
delete_confirmation: Are you sure to delete task?
change_lang_hier: You can change the language to German or English.
